message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I appreciate the fairness, but I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more reasonable.  This reflects the increased value of my time due to the time value of money.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is a bit more generous to me, but still fair for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to ensure I get a larger share to compensate for the inflation.  Let's split it 65-35 in my favor.
You're trying to compensate for inflation, but I'm not affected by it. My offer is still more generous than it needs to be.
